member.name: T:TitanicWeather.Managers.TitanicManager
member.summary: Class with methods used in the Rest API.

member.name: M:TitanicWeather.Managers.TitanicManagerDB.SummarizeDataForTheDay(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{TitanicWeather.Models.Measurement},System.DateTime)
member.summary: Sumarises a lot of measurements and returns summarised data in another object It is assumed that all of the measurements would be of the same day
member.param: list of measurements that need to be summarised
date of the measurements(to ensure that even if list is empty the data is still processed)
member.returns: returns object that contains min and max temperatuure and humidity in given list

member.name: M:TitanicWeather.Managers.TitanicManagerDB.GetSummarizedData
member.summary: Method gets data from database and through foreach loop runs it throuhg another method to summarise data for the day
member.returns: returns a Ienumerable off summarised data for last 7 days(including today) in chronological order

member.name: T:TitanicWeather.Models.SummarizedData
member.summary: Model for summarizing data for the day.
